chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In this video, we will learn about the forms and what is the input tag in the form.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Forms are an important element of websites because you submit data through the form from client to server.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: These are the forms that you see on the contact pages, on Google forms or inquiry forms.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: On the flight or railway ticket, you submit all the details through the HTML forms.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In the last video, many people liked it.

chunks.text: I will tell you a very quick difference between get request and post request.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Get request is a very simple request.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And post request is sent to most of the cases when we have to give a lot of data.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Whenever we have to give a form, we will use post request in most of the cases.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And what is get request?

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It is a very simple request.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: We just have to tell the server and that's it.

chunks.title: Forms and input tags in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Or we have to hit the server with a request.

text: In this video, we will learn about the forms and what is the input tag in the form. Forms are an important element of websites because you submit data through the form from client to server. These are the forms that you see on the contact pages, on Google forms or inquiry forms. On the flight or railway ticket, you submit all the details through the HTML forms. In the last video, many people liked it. I will request you to like this video with high energy so that we can maintain high energy throughout the course. So, let's go to the computer screen and see the forms, input tags and some best practices. Let's roll the intro. So guys, I have come to the computer screen. And now, I am going to make a folder here. The name of the folder is Video6. Because this is a 6th video. I will download it and open it with code. I have already told you all this. And here, I am going to make index.html. And by putting the exclamation mark on it, I will do the view, wrap, screen, mode, and you see here, I will write forms. Let's learn it. So, I have set the title of the form page here. And what happened by setting the title is that the title will be shown on our page. Here, I want to tell you about a very important setting, the show preview. People in the bar have also pointed out to me that you have to click so many times. So, can you do something? Yes, you can. Here, you click on the gear, click on the settings. And after clicking on the settings, what you do simply is, write here, live preview, live preview. And we can actually set it. When we click on it, what will happen is that it will open on the external browser. So, now, I will close everything. As soon as I click here, it will open on the external browser. But now, I want to tell you that as soon as we click here, it opens. So, if you want, do it like this. But sometimes, you want to prefer side by side view. And you want to do that when you are actually using HTML, CSS, or working on design. So, whenever you are working on design, you definitely want to see the live preview here. Which is why this extension was made. And it was made differently from the live server. That's why it will be seen in the side view. Now, what will we do here? We will go about forms. What is form? You know the name of form. It means the form of the railway. We fill it and it gets our reservation. Along with that, we fill the form of IEDJ, the form of need. We fill any form of the exam. So that we can reach our data to the person who wants it. So, this is form. HTML is a form tag. So, you will write form. You will enter. So, the first question will be about your form. Get or post? I will tell you a very quick difference between get request and post request. I will tell you the difference between get request and post request. Get request is a very simple request. And post request is sent to most of the cases when we have to give a lot of data. Whenever we have to give a form, we will use post request in most of the cases. And what is get request?
